ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The addition or reduction in the number of reserved shares that could potentially be issued under the option plan attributable to reasons other than grants, exercises, forfeitures, and expirations during the reporting period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount by which the current fair value of the underlying stock exceeds the exercise price of options outstanding.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of options outstanding, including both vested and non-vested options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted average price at which grantees can acquire the shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Aggregate Intrinsic Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount by which current fair value of underlying stock exceeds exercise price of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Number
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Number of fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding that can be converted into shares under option plan. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Vested and Expected to Vest, Outstanding, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Weighted-average exercise price, at which grantee can acquire shares reserved for issuance, for fully vested and expected to vest options outstanding. Includes, but is not limited to, unvested options for which requisite service period has not been rendered but that are expected to vest based on achievement of performance condition, if forfeitures are recognized when they occur.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Percentage of Outstanding Stock Maximum
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Maximum number of shares that may be issued in accordance with the plan as a proportion of outstanding capital stock.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which option holders acquired shares when converting their stock options into shares.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Grants in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average per share amount at which grantees can acquire shares of common stock by exercise of options.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangements by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Other Share Increase (Decrease) in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementsByShar.description: Weighted average price at which grantees could acquire or could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to any other type of change in shares reserved for issuance.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercisable, Intrinsic Value
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Amount of difference between fair value of the underlying shares reserved for issuance and exercise price of vested portions of options outstanding and currently exercisable.

SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Nonvested, Number of Shares
Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Purchase Price of Common Stock, Percent
SharebasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Purchase price of common stock expressed as a percentage of its fair value.

StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.label: Statutory Accounting Practices, Statutory Amount Available for Dividend Payments without Regulatory Approval
StatutoryAccountingPracticesStatutoryAmo.description: Amount of dividends that can be declared or paid without approval of regulatory agency.

StockholdersEquity.label: Stockholders' Equity Attributable to Parent
StockholdersEquity.description: Total of all stockholders' equity (deficit) items, net of receivables from officers, directors, owners, and affiliates of the entity which are attributable to the parent. The amount of the economic entity's stockholders' equity attributable to the parent excludes the amount of stockholders' equity which is allocable to that ownership interest in subsidiary equity which is not attributable to the parent (noncontrolling interest, minority interest). This excludes temporary equity and is sometimes called permanent equity.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Restricted Stock Award, Gross
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.description: Total number of shares issued during the period, including shares forfeited, as a result of Restricted Stock Awards.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Restricted Stock Award, Net of Forfeitures
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.description: Number of shares issued during the period related to Restricted Stock Awards, net of any shares forfeited.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Exercises in Period
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesStockOption.description: Number of share options (or share units) exercised during the current period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesTreasurySto.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Treasury Stock Reissued
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesTreasurySto.description: Number of treasury shares or units reissued. Excludes reissuance of shares or units in treasury for award under share-based payment arrangement.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Dividend
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockDividen.description: Value of stock issued to shareholders as a dividend during the period.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Stock Options Exercised
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueStockOptions.description: Value of stock issued as a result of the exercise of stock options.

SubordinatedDebt.label: Subordinated Debt
SubordinatedDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of subordinated debt (with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer). Subordinated debt places a lender in a lien position behind debt having a higher priority of repayment in liquidation of the entity's assets.

TaxBenefitFromStockOptionsExercised.label: Tax Benefit from Stock Options Exercised (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
TaxBenefitFromStockOptionsExercised.description: Reductions in the entity's income taxes that arise when compensation cost (from non-qualified stock options) recognized on the entity's tax return exceeds compensation cost from non-qualified stock options recognized on the income statement. This element increases net cash provided by operating activities.

TaxBenefitFromStockOptionsExercised1.label: Tax Benefit from Stock Options Exercised (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
TaxBenefitFromStockOptionsExercised1.description: Tax benefits realized from the exercise of stock options resulting in reductions in the entity's income taxes, which increases net cash provided by operating activities.

TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Amount
TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneLeverageCapitalRequiredForCapital.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 leverage capital to average assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Capital Adequacy, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredForCapita.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets required for capital adequacy as defined by regulatory framework.

TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, after Year Five
TimeDepositMaturitiesAfterYearFive.description: Amount of time deposit maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesNextRollingTwelveMo.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Next Rolling Twelve Months
TimeDepositMaturitiesNextRollingTwelveMo.description: Amount of time deposits maturing in the next rolling twelve months following the latest balance sheet. Time deposits include, but are not limited to, certificates of deposits. For interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported on a rolling approach, from latest balance sheet date.

TimeDepositMaturitiesRemainderOfFiscalYe.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Remainder of Fiscal Year
TimeDepositMaturitiesRemainderOfFiscalYe.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in remainder of current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit.

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Five
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFive.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Four
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearFour.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year One
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearOne.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Three
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearThree.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.label: Time Deposit Maturities, Year Two
TimeDepositMaturitiesYearTwo.description: Amount of time deposit maturing in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TimeDeposits.label: Time Deposits
TimeDeposits.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit.

TimeDeposits100000OrMore.label: Time Deposits, $100,000 or More
TimeDeposits100000OrMore.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of $100,000 or more.

TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.label: Time Deposits, at or Above FDIC Insurance Limit
TimeDepositsAtOrAboveFDICInsuranceLimit.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations that meet or exceed the Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation (FDIC) insurance limit.

TimeDepositsLessThan100000.label: Time Deposits, Less than $100,000
TimeDepositsLessThan100000.description: Amount of time deposit liabilities, including certificates of deposit, in denominations of less than $100,000.

TimeDepositsNoncurrent.label: Time Deposit Maturities, after Year One
TimeDepositsNoncurrent.description: Amount of time deposit maturing after next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Time deposit includes, but is not limited to, certificate of deposit. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

TransferToOtherRealEstate.label: Real Estate Owned, Transfer to Real Estate Owned
TransferToOtherRealEstate.description: Value transferred from mortgage loans to real estate owned (REO) in noncash transactions.

TreasuryStockShares.label: Treasury Stock, Shares
TreasuryStockShares.description: Number of common and preferred shares that were previously issued and that were repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury on the financial statement date. This stock has no voting rights and receives no dividends.

TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.label: Treasury Stock, Shares, Acquired
TreasuryStockSharesAcquired.description: Number of shares that have been repurchased during the period and are being held in treasury.

TreasuryStockValue.label: Treasury Stock, Value
TreasuryStockValue.description: The amount allocated to treasury stock. Treasury stock is common and preferred shares of an entity that were issued, repurchased by the entity, and are held in its treasury.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Cost Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredCostMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the cost method.

TreasuryStockValueAcquiredParValueMethod.label: Treasury Stock, Value, Acquired, Par Value Method
TreasuryStockValueAcquiredParValueMethod.description: Equity impact of the cost of common and preferred stock that were repurchased during the period. Recorded using the par value method.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Prior Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions taken in prior period tax returns.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties and Interest Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount accrued for interest on an underpayment of income taxes and penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Current Period Tax Positions
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from tax positions that have been or will be taken in current period tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Reduction Resulting from Lapse of Applicable Statute of Limitations
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsReductionsResulti.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from lapses of applicable statutes of limitations.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsResultingInNetOpe.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits Resulting in Net Operating Loss Carryforward (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsResultingInNetOpe.description: Amount of an unrecognized tax benefit that is directly related to a position taken in a tax year that results in a net operating loss carryforward. This amount is presented as a reduction of the related deferred tax asset in the balance sheet if that deferred tax asset is not used. This amount is presented separately from the deferred tax asset for a net operating loss carryforward if this unrelated tax benefit is associated with a different tax position.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits that Would Impact Effective Tax Rate
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsThatWouldImpactEf.description: The total amount of unrecognized tax benefits that, if recognized, would affect the effective tax rate.

ValuationAllowanceAmount.label: Valuation Allowance, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ValuationAllowanceAmount.description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded as of the balance sheet date pertaining to the specified deferred tax asset for which an assessment was made that it is more likely than not that all or a portion of such deferred tax asset will not be realized through related deductions on future tax returns.

ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.label: Valuation Allowance, Deferred Tax Asset, Increase (Decrease), Amount
ValuationAllowanceDeferredTaxAssetChange.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the valuation allowance for a specified deferred tax asset.

ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecogni.label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Deductions for Aggregate Write-Downs
ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecogni.description: Amount of decrease in the valuation allowance for impairment of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer from write-downs charged against the allowance.

ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecogni.label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Balance
ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecogni.description: Reflects the estimated amount of impairment as of the balance sheet date of recognized servicing assets that are being amortized in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income or loss.

WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfDilutedSharesOuts.description: The average number of shares or units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating diluted EPS or earnings per unit (EPU), determined based on the timing of issuance of shares or units in the period.

WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.label: Weighted Average Number of Shares Outstanding, Basic
WeightedAverageNumberOfSharesOutstanding.description: Number of [basic] shares or units, after adjustment for contingently issuable shares or units and other shares or units not deemed outstanding, determined by relating the portion of time within a reporting period that common shares or units have been outstanding to the total time in that period.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpense.description: Amount of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes amount capitalized.

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Gain
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.description: Amount of unrealized gain on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss
AvailableForSaleDebtSecuritiesGrossUnrea.description: Amount of unrealized loss on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleGainLoss.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleGainLoss.description: Amount of unrealized and realized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

InterestBearingDepositsInBanks.label: Interest-bearing Deposits in Banks and Other Financial Institutions
InterestBearingDepositsInBanks.description: For banks and other depository institutions (including Federal Reserve Banks, if applicable): Interest-bearing deposits in other financial institutions for relatively short periods of time including, for example, certificates of deposits, which are presented separately from cash on the balance sheet.

InterestExpenseOther.label: Interest Expense, Other
InterestExpenseOther.description: Amount of interest expense classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Marketable Securities
ProceedsFromSaleAndMaturityOfMarketableS.description: The cash inflow associated with the aggregate amount received by the entity through sale or maturity of marketable securities (held-to-maturity or available-for-sale) during the period.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Equity Instruments Other than Options, Vested in Period, Fair Value
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Fair value of share-based awards for which the grantee gained the right by satisfying service and performance requirements, to receive or retain shares or units, other instruments, or cash.

AmortizationOfMortgageServicingRightsMSR.label: Amortization of Mortgage Servicing Rights (MSRs)
AmortizationOfMortgageServicingRightsMSR.description: The periodic amortization (in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income or loss) of capitalized servicing rights, which contractually entitle the servicer to receive fees and ancillary revenues for performing billing, collection, disbursement and recordkeeping services in connection with a mortgage portfolio. As a noncash expense, this element is added back to net income when calculating cash provided by or used in operations using the indirect method.

CapitalRequiredToBeWellCapitalizedToRisk.label: Banking Regulation, Total Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
CapitalRequiredToBeWellCapitalizedToRisk.description: Ratio of minimum total risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on financing receivable. Excludes allowance for financing receivable covered under loss sharing agreement.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Recovery
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of increase in allowance for credit loss on financing receivable from recovery.

FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.label: Financing Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
FinancingReceivableAllowanceForCreditLos.description: Amount of writeoff of financing receivable, charged against allowance for credit loss.

FinancingReceivableNonaccrualPercentPast.label: Financing Receivable, Nonaccrual, Percent Past Due
FinancingReceivableNonaccrualPercentPast.description: Percentage of nonaccrual financing receivable balance outstanding that is past due.

FinancingReceivablePercentPastDue1.label: Financing Receivable, Percent Past Due
FinancingReceivablePercentPastDue1.description: Percentage of financing receivable balance that is past due.

LoanPortfolioExpense.label: Loan Portfolio Expense
LoanPortfolioExpense.description: The loan servicing fees paid to third parties that relate to loan expenses for a portfolio containing the entire group of loans owned by the company.

NotesReceivableGross.label: Financing Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss
NotesReceivableGross.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable.

ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.label: Provision for Loan, Lease, and Other Losses
ProvisionForLoanLeaseAndOtherLosses.description: Amount of expense related loan transactions, lease transactions, credit loss from transactions other than loan and lease transactions, and other loss based on assessment of uncollectability from the counterparty to reduce the account to their net realizable value.

TierOneLeverageCapitalToAverageAssets.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Leverage Capital Ratio, Actual
TierOneLeverageCapitalToAverageAssets.description: Ratio of Tier 1 capital to average assets as defined by regulatory framework.

TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.label: Banking Regulation, Tier One Risk-Based Capital Ratio, Well Capitalized, Minimum
TierOneRiskBasedCapitalRequiredToBeWellC.description: Ratio of minimum Tier 1 risk-based capital to risk-weighted assets categorized as well capitalized as defined by regulatory framework for prompt corrective action.

AdjustmentForAmortization.label: Amortization
AdjustmentForAmortization.description: The aggregate amount of recurring noncash expense charged against earnings in the period to allocate the cost of assets over their estimated remaining economic lives.

BusinessCombinationAcquiredReceivablesFa.label: Business Combination, Acquired Receivable, Fair Value
BusinessCombinationAcquiredReceivablesFa.description: Fair value of acquired receivable from business combination, excluding certain loans and debt securities acquired in transfer.

BusinessCombinationAcquiredReceivablesGr.label: Business Combination, Acquired Receivables, Gross Contractual Amount
BusinessCombinationAcquiredReceivablesGr.description: For receivables acquired in a business combination, excluding certain loans and debt securities acquired in a transfer (as defined), this element represents the gross contractual amounts receivable, by major class of receivable, such as loans, direct finance leases (as defined), and any other class of receivables.

BusinessCombinationIntegrationRelatedCos.label: Business Combination, Integration Related Costs
BusinessCombinationIntegrationRelatedCos.description: Costs incurred to effect a business combination which have been expensed during the period. Such costs could include business integration costs, systems integration and conversion costs, and severance and other employee-related costs.

DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.label: Debt Instrument, Face Amount
DebtInstrumentFaceAmount.description: Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.label: Goodwill, Acquired During Period
GoodwillAcquiredDuringPeriod.description: Amount of increase in asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized resulting from a business combination.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Fair Value, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 5 Through 10
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Amortized Cost, Maturity, Allocated and Single Maturity Date, after Year 5 Through 10
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesDebtMaturitiesAf.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), with single maturity date and allocated without single maturity date, maturing in sixth through tenth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValue.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Fair Value
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesFairValue.description: Fair value of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

LineOfCreditFacilityPeriodicPayment.label: Line of Credit Facility, Periodic Payment
LineOfCreditFacilityPeriodicPayment.description: Amount of the required periodic payments of both interest and principal.

ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndP.label: Proceeds from Loan and Lease Originations and Principal Collections
ProceedsFromLoanAndLeaseOriginationsAndP.description: Cash inflow related to a loan origination (the process when securing a mortgage for a piece of real property), lease origination, and principal collections.
